org.jamwiki.utils

Class Encryption

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jamwiki.utils.Encryption

  • public class Encryption
extends Object
    Provide capability for encrypting and decrypting values. Inspired by an example from http://www.devx.com/assets/sourcecode/10387.zip.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String DES_ALGORITHM 
      static String ENCRYPTION_KEY 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      static String getEncryptedProperty(String name, Properties props)
      If a property value is encrypted, return the unencrypted value.
      static void setEncryptedProperty(String name, String value, Properties props)
      Encrypt and set a property value.

    • Method Detail

      • encrypt

        public static String encrypt(String unencryptedString)

      • getEncryptedProperty

        public static String getEncryptedProperty(String name,
                                          Properties props)
        If a property value is encrypted, return the unencrypted value. Note that if this method finds an un-encrypted value it will automatically encrypt it and re-save it to the property file.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the encrypted property being retrieved.
        Returns:
        The unencrypted value of the property.

      • setEncryptedProperty

        public static void setEncryptedProperty(String name,
                                        String value,
                                        Properties props)
        Encrypt and set a property value.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the encrypted property being retrieved.
        value - The unenencrypted value of the property.
        props - The property object in which the property is being set.
